title: [HKGBUDDIES] GFRIEND討論區(178) 最緊要身體健康 勤洗手戴口罩

replies.msg:
#1

歡迎黎到 GFRIEND 討論區






GFRIEND（여자친구）是Source Music於2015年推出的韓國六人女子音樂組合，
成員包括Sowon、Yerin、Eunha、Yuju、SinB和Umji。


2014年10月30日，Source Music公開將於11月推出6人女團。
同日，官網介紹4位成員: Sowon、Yerin、SinB、Umji。
GFRIEND出道延遲至2015年。
2015年1月5日，Source Music通過官網公布GFRIEND出道日，
並公開成員Eunha和Yuju。11日後的1月16日正式出道。
2016年1月25日，公布粉絲名稱為Buddy(Buddies)。
2017年3月15日，公開官方應援棒為「GLASS MARBLE STICK」。
2017年4月2日，第一次舉行粉絲見面會
2017年7月16日，第一次在香港舉行迷你演唱會。
2018年1月6-7日，第一次舉行單獨演唱會。
2018年4月26日，公開官方應援色為「PANTONE 11-4201 Cloud Dancer」、
「PANTONE 16-4725 Scuba Blue」和「PANTONE 18-3838 Ultra Violet」。
2018年9月1日，在香港舉行第一場單獨演唱會。







https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cFCjpyA_AdM
170716 GFRIEND 여자친구1st Mini Concert in Hong Kong 香港應援影片

Gfriend's concert tour of Malaysia in 2019 attracted widespread critical acclaim by the media, such as Japan Today, Japan News, Japan Times Online and many other cultural websites. Their song "Yellow" so far has been greeted with popular acclaim. Their concert tour of Asia this year to date has met with high international acclaim in the press, including Southern Daily, Oriental Daily, South China Morning Post, Hong Kong Economic Journal and various cultural websites. I saw them live twice with my friends at Saitama Super Arena last year which was marvelous and unforgettable. The first time we saw their concert last year, we were late. I remember I said "Look at the time. The concert will have begun." It was quarter after eight. The concert would've started by then. At the end of the last encore, they bowed onstage, woaking up the applause. They met with a standing ovation and thunderous applause. It was a worthwhile concert that was compelling enough to see again. Gfriend and the dancers and acrobats who were invited to perform alongside the group gave a superb performance. The choreography, the stage design, the lighting design and the glow sticks were magnificent and surpassed our expectations. The group is very carrer-minded. My cousin who's also very career-oriented is planning on having Gfriend endorse her company's products but she'll have to make it financially worthwhile for them. Gfriend has a worthwhile job and career. I consider music performing a worthwhile career. After the concert, we dined in a ramen restaurant nearby. I remember the table was sticky maybe because the staff forgot to wipe it up so I asked them to wipe it up. Later, i spilt label if miso soup all over the table and the floor so i had to wipe the spilled soup up. We had a friendly chat with a lady sitting at a nearby table who told us that in centuries past, a whole village was wiped out by a catastrophic earthquake which was fascinating to hear. When I finished my bowl of ramen, I wiped my mouth on my sleeves lol and a few pieces of tissues. There's an elegant cafe nearby of which the interior and the exterior are artistically and exquisitely designed. My friend Celine spilt her cappuccino all over her work and on her trousers so she ended up wiping up this mess. I enjoy drinking coffee and chatting with the baristas there so much that I occasionally make it worth their while. Besides being an incredible musician,  SinB is an avid runner. She took part in a five hundred meter race where she came first. She rose to the occasion, ran for all she was worth and dived across the finishing line, passing the runners who were ahead of her earlier. Her family, friends and loads of her fans congratulated her on having won the race as she held the trophy up. The race was the opportunity for all the world's best female runners to strut their stuff. It was truly memorable. Yesterday, I assigned six hours for practising their songs on my saxophone, piccolo, flute, oboe, cor anglais (english horn), clarinet, E-flat clarinet, bass clarinet, bassoon and contrabassoon. i practised with my friends who played glockenspiel, xylophone, marimba, vibraphone, chimes, timpani (kettledrums) and celesta, all of which have definite pitch. The other week, I practised their songs on my trumpet, cornet, trombone, euphonium, French horn and tuba. I practised with my other friends who played triangle, tambourine, castanets, sleigh bells (jingle bells), cymbals (hi-hat, crash and ride), gongs, snare drum and bass drum, all of which have indefinite pitch. Adding these instruments makes the music more rhythmic. Saxophone, cor anglais and clarinet are transposing instruments. Sax, clarinet and bass clarinet are single reed instruments whereas oboe, cor anglais, bassoon and contrabassoon are double reed instruments. Piccolo and flute are reedless instruments.

​19日，據kakao方面消息，Melon計劃在今年上半年廢除以1小時為單位統計再生量的現行實時排行榜，並推出以24小時為標準統計的新順位表。
以最近24小時為基準，對每首歌曲1人播放1次的次數進行統計，並每隔1個小時更新一次。
公司相關人士表示:“這是為了避免排名競爭，讓用戶發現更多樣的曲目，從而拓寬音樂的多樣性。
